author: Reuters Editorial
title: Resilux Says Johan Vanovenberghe To Serve As Non-Executive Independent Director For Duration Of Chris Van Doorslaer's Mandate
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Resilux Nv:
* BOARD OF DIRECTORS CO-OPTS INTAL BVBA, REPRESENTED BY ITS PERMANENT REPRESENTATIVE MR. JOHAN VANOVENBERGHE (CORRECTS SYNTAX)
* JOHAN VANOVENBERGHE TO SERVE AS NON-EXECUTIVE INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR FOR THE REMAINING DURATION OF THE MANDATE OF CHRIS VAN DOORSLAER (CORRECTS SYNTAX) Source text: bit.ly/2o4JYXQ Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
